name: Jeremy
placeOfBirth: Bryanview, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S)
description: Jeremy is a amber-eyed llama with brown hair, standing 130 cm tall. Originally from Bryanview, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S), Jeremy enjoys painting, gardening, dancing. Known for their gentle and playful personality, Jeremy is a beloved member of the llama community.
